title: shrI sarasvati namOstutE
sahitya:
shrI sarasvati namOstutE varadE paradEvatE shrIpati gaurIpati guruguha vinutE vidhiyuvatE


caraNam   vAsanA traya vivarjita varamuni bhAvita mUrttE vAsavAdyakhila 
nirjara vara vitaraNa bahukIrttE dharahAsa yutA mukhAmburuhE adbhuta 
caraNAmburuhE samsAra bhItyApahE sakala mantrAkSara guhE
					(ciTTasvara)
pa,,ma pa da pa pa!ma ga ri sa r,,ma ga ri sa ni da sa ri ma
pa ma ga ri ,sa ri ma pa da sa ri ma ga ri sa ,ni da pa ma ga ri ma
